REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F Y f2617 reute r f BC-sulpetro 03-20 0093

TEXT.TITLE: <SULPETRO LTD> YEAR OCT 31 LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 19.22 dlrs vs loss 3.90 dlrs Net loss 276.4 mln vs loss 45.6 mln Revs 85.4 mln vs 113.3 mln NOTE: Shr results after deducting preferred share dividends of 13.1 mln dlrs in both periods. Current loss includes a 125 mln dlr writedown of oil and gas properties, a 67 mln dlr writeoff of deferred charges, a 22.5 mln dlr loss on disposal of U.K. properties, a 21.2 mln dlr equity loss from affiliate Sulbath Exploration ltd and a 4.6 mln dlr loss on other investments. Reuter
